ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Skyshards
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in skyshards, a new item that can only be encountered through a new quest. Pawns can interact with skyshards to boost their skill levels.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
- Based on the ‘Elder Scrolls’ series by Bethesda Game Studios.
